title: Rebooked at the International - FLAC 8 - Lossless (2011)
description:
This deluxe 4 CD set released by Backdraft is the ultimate January/February 1970 engagement package. 'Rebooked at the International' features multi-track recordings by RCA including unreleased leftovers that did not make the 'On Stage' album. These are the original rough mixes made by Felton Jarvis in early 1970 in preparation for the up-coming 'On Stage' album
